name: Freedom Fantasy
short_description: Freedom Fantasy is an open-source RPG (role-playing game) inspired by both the classic game Final Fantasy for the NES and the open-source software culture. It stars leading free and open-source software mascots GNU, Tux, Mozilla, and Beastie and features appearances from many more. It is written in C++ and uses the SDL library (not included) for graphics. The source code is available under the GNU GPL version 2 or later.
summary: Open-source RPG for Linux similar to the NES game Final Fantasy
